name: @decent-dao/wallet-provider
description: Using ![Web3 Modal](https://web3modal.com) to connect Ethereum or EVM supported wallets.

scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && cd sandbox && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.package:install: npm run clean:all && npm install && cd sandbox && npm install
scripts.build: npm run clean && microbundle --jsx React.createElement && cp package.json README.md ./dist
scripts.build:link: npm run build && cd ./dist && npm link && cd .. && npm run set:link

author: Decent DAO
